nodes.text: Hosnian Prime Academy of Law Enforcement
The Hosnian Prime Academy of Law Enforcement was a law enforcement training center that boasted graduates of varying species.

Located on Hosnian Prime, the New Republic academy was where the human Exantor Divo graduated from in 19 ABY. At the time, Divo aspired to become a Sector Ranger, yet instead later found himself serving as a New Republic police officer with the rank of commissioner.
